parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.21</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if version of application is available. If the current version is older than the required one, a warning message is shown and [[false]] is returned. 

<br>Version of format '''Major.Minor''', e.g. '''1.30'''</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''requiredVersion''' version </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> version: [[String]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] !([[requiredVersion]] "1.09") [[exitWith]] {};</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[productVersion]], [[supportInfo]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>

<h3 style="display:none">Notes</h3>
<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 12, 2008
<dt class="note">[[User:Kronzky|Kronzky]]
<dd class="note">If the script contains a command that was introduced ''after'' the required version, it will still generate a syntax error, even if this test is done at the top of the script (as the whole script is parsed before execution).


<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
